Who can moderate?

All Monks who have attained [id://17645] (and above) can moderate (i.e. approve and front-page) nodes. This is how the PerlMonks community "self-moderates". There is no elite group of moderators.

If you can moderate, and are ready to get started, please read [id://29730] for the information you need to know in order to carry out your duties as a moderator.

More info on moderation is available at [id://17688].

Back to the [PerlMonks FAQ]
